Name: Revolution Triumph
About the game: Command and win Your actions will determine whether the Workers 'and peasants' Red army will be able to hold the important strategic point of Tsaritsyn while fighting against the Belokazaks. Edicts Let's give decrees to increase stability. support and military production. Decrees and regulations Follow the rules to get bonuses for political and economic parameters. Newspaper news Read the news to understand more about the relationship between the participants of the Civil war in Russia. Modifications Create and download mods to expand the game's potential.
